INSERT INTO monitoring_date (org_seq , location , location_code , pm25 , pm10 , info_Date)
SELECT data_seq , location , location_code , nvl(pm25, 0) , nvl(pm10, 0) , info_Date FROM origin_data WHERE pm25 IS NULL OR pm10 IS NULL

INSERT INTO send_data (org_seq , af_info_date , af25_avg , af10_avg , alert_rank)
SELECT C.data_seq , C.INFO_DATE_AF , C.AF25_AVG , C.AF10_AVG , C.ALERT_RANK FROM ( SELECT B.data_seq , B.location , B.location_code , B.info_date , TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(B.info_Date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') + 1/24), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') AS INFO_DATE_AF , B.PM25 , B.AF25_AVG , B.PM10 , B.AF10_AVG , CASE WHEN B.AF25_AVG >= 150 THEN '1' WHEN B.AF10_AVG >= 300 THEN '2' WHEN B.AF25_AVG >= 75 THEN '3' WHEN B.AF10_AVG >= 150 THEN '4' ELSE NULL END AS ALERT_RANK FROM( SELECT A.data_seq , A.location , A.location_code , A.info_date , A.pm25 , A.pm10 , (AF25 + pm25) / 2 AS AF25_AVG , (AF10 + pm10) / 2 AS AF10_AVG FROM (SELECT data_seq , location , location_code , info_date , NVL(pm25, '0') AS PM25 , NVL(pm10, '0') AS PM10 , LEAD (NVL(pm25, '0')) OVER (ORDER BY info_date) AS AF25 , LEAD (NVL(pm10, '0')) OVER (ORDER BY info_date) AS AF10 FROM origin_data WHERE LOCATION = #{location} ORDER BY info_date ) A ) B ) C WHERE C.ALERT_RANK IS NOT NULL
